title: Is There Room for Egan Bernal on Ineos Grenadiers’ Crowded Tour de France Roster?
content:
Colombia's first Tour de France winner is fighting for GC space alongside Pidcock and Rodríguez on the Ineos Grenadiers roster: 'I still don't know if I will race the Tour.'

Read the full article at Is There Room for Egan Bernal on Ineos Grenadiers’ Crowded Tour de France Roster? on Velo.
author: ahood
